speaker: Will Webster
title: Building Highly Engaged Teams
description:
Hiring and retaining good people is hard but super critical. A high performing team delivers, has fun and kicks goals.

Over the years I have become known for hiring and spotting good talent. I have had compliments from senior architects and leaders on the quality of people I choose for my teams.

Hiring is an art form and a challenging endeavour. Get it wrong and you will pay the price.

So how do you attract top talent and maintain top class engagement scores?
